_header: There is light right and might
_description: On Light, Right and Might — four long rhyming lines

CULEe435a.Transcription:
Ther ys leythe reythe and meytheMeythe euere set Reyth ffor the
                    deffawte of leythebet & Reythe meythe com to leythescheld or neuer
                    meythe euer set reythe
CULEe435a.Editions:
Ritson,  Joseph,
                        ed.  
             Pieces of Ancient Popular Poetry.
         London: Clarke, 1791; 2nd ed. 1833: 59.
